message:
Non-alert monitor

This monitor notifies when the job-digest-to-push-notifications pubsub subscription has older messages on the subscription. This does not mean that the job has failed. [Pubsub: job-digest-to-push-notifications subscription is not processing messages](https://app.datadoghq.com/monitors/30463111) will notify when the messages have stopped being processed.

The two monitors are used in the composite monitor, [Pubsub: job-digest-to-push-notifications subscription stopped processing old messages](https://app.datadoghq.com/monitors/30463626), which will notify when the messages are present on the subscription AND are not being processed. See this monitor for more info on how to handle incident.
name: Pubsub: job-digest-to-push-notifications subscription has old messages
